https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.title: IdentityCredential
https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.description: Identity Credential assues that Credential Issuer performed an identity verification process and that subject DID is a trusted entity.

https://schema.org/parentOrganization.description: Name of the legal entity or location holding the ATP Credential.

https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.title: Due Diligence Source
https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.description: The "dueDiligenceSource" property describes the due dilligence type that has been performed to verify the enterprise identity, ie. the identitiy of the credential Subject

https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.title: Due Diligence Source
https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.description: The "dueDiligenceSignature" property holds the signature of the company that performed due dilligence.

schema.title: IdentityCredential
schema.description: Identity Credential assues that Credential Issuer performed an identity verification process and that subject DID is a trusted entity.

parent.description: Name of the legal entity or location holding the ATP Credential.

legalName.description: Address of the legal entity or location holding the ATP Credential

dueDiligenceSource.title: Due Diligence Source
dueDiligenceSource.description: The "dueDiligenceSource" property describes the due dilligence type that has been performed to verify the enterprise identity, ie. the identitiy of the credential Subject

dueDiligenceSignature.title: Due Diligence Source
dueDiligenceSignature.description: The "dueDiligenceSignature" property holds the signature of the company that performed due dilligence.

https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.title: Postal Address
https://open-credentialing-initiative.gi.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

https://schema.org/streetAddress.title: Street Address
https://schema.org/streetAddress.description: The street address expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building.

https://schema.org/addressLocality.title: Address Locality
https://schema.org/addressLocality.description: Text specifying the name of the locality; for example, a city.

https://schema.org/addressRegion.title: Address Region
https://schema.org/addressRegion.description: Text specifying a province or state in abbreviated format; for example, NJ.

https://schema.org/postalCode.title: Postal Code
https://schema.org/postalCode.description: Text specifying the postal code for an address.
